attr.title: Alruna and the Necro-Industrialists
attr.desc: Welcome to a compact, tightly packed Metroidvania, where the Square Aspect Ratio and Single Screen Level Design allows every one of the 200+ rooms to slot into the larger puzzle-box of the world; where secrets, exploits and sequence-breaking are built into the very foundation of the game; and where the overarching story doesnâ€™t care too much which path you happen to take through the game.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy game files into the assets folder.
